about_the_game:
Unlock 277 puzzles depicting wild, lovable, and crazy animals!

Adorable cats and dogs are just the beginning -- make fun and challenging puzzles of birds, tigers, elephants, giraffes, fish... practically any animal you can think of! Make these puzzles on your own or with friends and family.

In addition to unlocking 277 unique puzzles, this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

This pack combines the Puzzle Together packages "Animals", "Pets", and "Museum Nature". This is a $34.97 value if purchased individually in-game -- plus you'll receive $3.99 worth of puzzle credits.

Curl up with your cat, dog or chicken, and enjoy some relaxing puzzle time!

Here are just a few of the puzzle images included in this pack:

Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: ARMv7 with Neon Support (32-bit) or ARM64
